text: General elections were held in the Pitcairn Islands on 9 December 2007. Mike Warren was elected mayor, replacing the incumbent Jay Warren, who came in second place in a three-way contest. The Island Council was also renewed. ==References== Category:Elections in the Pitcairn Islands Pitcairn General election Pitcairn general election,2007 Pitcairn Category:December 2007 events in Oceania
title: 2007 Pitcairnese general election
